title: Fatten your cash roll for the national - n162 wanted
author: 1880nonsports

posts.post_title: Fatten your cash roll for the national - n162 wanted
posts.post_content: Wanted Kelly solid vg/x-x. Help me finish my set....please :-) Have money and some limited trade bait - Goodwin champions ROUND album, Goodwin Champions (n162) album, Goodwin Champions (N162) album professionally framed, Darktown Battery baseball bank, couple tobacco non-sport BANNERS - stuff like that! NOT looking for an overgraded card BUT I will pay up for a correctly graded one.

[quote name="1880nonsports" post=2445144]Wanted Kelly solid vg/x-x. Help me finish my set....please :-) Have money and some limited trade bait - Goodwin champions ROUND album, Goodwin Champions (n162) album, Goodwin Champions (N162) album professionally framed, Darktown Battery baseball bank, couple tobacco non-sport BANNERS - stuff like that! NOT looking for an overgraded card BUT I will pay up for a correctly graded one.[/QUOTE]


I'll give you advise, if you just want great eye appeal buy the authentic trimmed one on eBay. I purchased the Caruthers from them and the card is absolutely stunning.

Not a bad idea but since I got rid of my out of register example in a psa 3 a number of years ago - I’m kind of locked in to getting an example that fits right in with the other 49 cards. An outgrowth of my OCD….. too late and too old to change.
